languages.text: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, the wearer has a 25% chance to gain 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer deals damage to an enemy, the wearer has a 25% chance to gain 2 MP.

languages.text: Нанося противнику {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, персонаж с шансом 25% получает 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a un enemigo, tiene una probabilidad del 25 % de ganar 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.

languages.text: Immer wenn der Träger einem Feind {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} verursacht, hat der Träger eine Chance von 25 % auf den Erhalt von 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à un ennemi, il a 25 % de chances de gagner 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.
